SVGMaskElement.summary: The SVGMaskElement interface provides access to the properties of mask elements, as well as methods to manipulate them.

SVGMaskElementWidth.summary: The read-only width property of the interface returns an object containing the value of the {{SVGattr("width")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("mask")}}.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementWidth.value: An object. The baseVal property of this object returns an , the value of which returns the width value.

SVGMaskElementMaskContentUnits.summary: The read-only maskContentUnits property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("maskContentUnits")}} attribute. It indicates which coordinate system to use for the contents of the {{SVGElement("mask")}} element.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementMaskContentUnits.value: An representing the coordinate system. The possible values are defined in the interface:

SVGMaskElementX.summary: The read-only x property of the interface returns an object containing the value of the {{SVGattr("x")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("mask")}}. It represents the x-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the masking area.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementX.value: An object in the coordinate system defined by . The baseVal property of this object returns an , the value of which returns the initial x value.

SVGMaskElementHeight.summary: The read-only height property of the interface returns an object containing the value of the {{SVGattr("height")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("mask")}}.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementHeight.value: An object. The baseVal property of this object returns an , the value of which returns the height value.

SVGMaskElementMaskUnits.summary: The read-only maskUnits property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("maskUnits")}} attribute of a {{SVGElement("mask")}} element which defines the coordinate system to use for the mask of the element.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementMaskUnits.value: An representing the coordinate system. The possible values are defined in the interface:

SVGMaskElementY.summary: The read-only y property of the interface returns an object containing the value of the {{SVGattr("y")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("mask")}}. It represents the y-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the masking area.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementY.value: An object. The baseVal property of this object returns an , the value of which returns the y value.
